description:
Description
The bmt data frame has 137 rows and 22 columns.
title: data from Section 1.3
usage: This data frame contains the following columns:
reference:
Klein and Moeschberger (1997) Survival Analysis Techniques for Censored
and truncated data, Springer.

parameters.z10: MTX Used as a Graft-Versus-Host- Prophylactic: 1-Yes 0-No
parameters.dc: Chronic GVHD Indicator 1-Developed Chronic GVHD 0-Never Developed Chronic GVHD
parameters.group: Disease Group 1-ALL, 2-AML Low Risk, 3-AML High Risk
parameters.da: Acute GVHD Indicator 1-Developed Acute GVHD 0-Never Developed Acute GVHD)
parameters.dp: Platelet Recovery Indicator 1-Platelets Returned To Normal, 0-Platelets Never Returned to Normal
parameters.t1: Time To Death Or On Study Time
parameters.d3: Disease Free Survival Indicator 1-Dead Or Relapsed, 0-Alive Disease Free)
parameters.z7: Waiting Time to Transplant In Days
parameters.t2: Disease Free Survival Time (Time To Relapse, Death Or End Of Study)
